amendment.description: Amendment allows national laboratories to be included as stakeholders in the Cybersecurity Strategic Research and Development Plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 111-410 to allow national laboratories to be included as stakeholders in the Cybersecurity Strategic Research and Development Plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heinrich amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Heinrich.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Heinrich amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
